revision.text:
{{Infobox Oak Item |name = Amulet Coin |image = [[File:Bag_Amulet_Coin_Sprite.png]] |caption = Artwork of the ''Amulet Coin''. |dex = 30 |effect = Gain more coins from Battling }} The '''Amulet Coin''' is an [[Oak Items|Oak Item]]. When equipped, it increases the amount of money gained.
Note, the description of the item mentions only battling, however the effect is applied whenever the player gains money. The Amulet Coin is unlocked after catching 30 unique pokemon. == Details == {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Level !! Effect !! Upgrade Requirements !! Upgrade Cost |- |0 || x1.25 Coins Earned || 500 defeated Pokémon || 50,000 {{pdollar}} |- |1 || x1.3 Coins Earned || 500 defeated Pokémon || 100,000 {{pdollar}} |- |2 || x1.35 Coins Earned || 1500 defeated Pokémon || 250,000 {{pdollar}} |- |3 || x1.4 Coins Earned || 2500 defeated Pokémon || 500,000 {{pdollar}} |- |4 || x1.45 Coins Earned || 5000 defeated Pokémon || 1,000,000 {{pdollar}} |- |5/Max || x1.5 Coins Earned || N/A || N/A |- |}
{{Oak items}}
